Header: The Presidentpraises the attempt of the youth to beautify the country
Content: President Gotabhaya Rajapaksa has praised the initiative taken by the youth to safeguard the environment and beautify the country. In a tweet, the President pointed out that a strong foundation is being laid to change the course of thecountryâ€™s future by the youth, with their initiative, leadership, & teamwork. The President observed that bringing forth creativity as a positive force in our society, is symbolic of a productive culture in the making. He also said that he is really proud of these youngsters.
